mapper.select: SELECT id,house_no houseNo,remark_name remarkName,area,address,type,building,unit,room,state, due_time dueTime,water_type_id waterTypeId,sale,electic_type_id electicTypeId,rubbish_type_id rubbishTypeId, property_type_id propertyTypeId,park_no parkNo,`owner` FROM ht_house where is_del=0
SELECT building FROM ht_house GROUP BY building ORDER BY building ASC
SELECT unit FROM ht_house WHERE building=#{building} GROUP BY unit ORDER BY unit ASC
SELECT room FROM ht_house WHERE unit=#{unit} GROUP BY room ORDER BY room ASC

SELECT h.id,h.house_no houseNo,h.remark_name remarkName,h.area,h.address,h.type,h.building,h.unit,h.room,h.state, h.due_time dueTime,h.water_type_id waterTypeId,h.sale,h.electic_type_id electicTypeId,h.rubbish_type_id rubbishTypeId, h.property_type_id propertyTypeId,h.park_no parkNo,h.`owner` FROM ht_user u LEFT JOIN ht_user_house uh ON u.id=uh.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_house h ON uh.house_id=h.id WHERE u.openid=#{openid} AND h.is_del=0

SELECT id,house_no houseNo,remark_name remarkName,area,address,type,building,unit,room,state, due_time dueTime,water_type_id waterTypeId,sale,electic_type_id electicTypeId,rubbish_type_id rubbishTypeId, property_type_id propertyTypeId,park_no parkNo,`owner` FROM ht_house WHERE house_no=#{houseNo} AND is_del=0

SELECT id,house_no houseNo,remark_name remarkName,area,address,type,building,unit,room,state,due_time dueTime,water_type_id waterTypeId,sale, electic_type_id electicTypeId,rubbish_type_id rubbishTypeId,property_type_id propertyTypeId,park_no parkNo,`owner` FROM ht_house WHERE `owner` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') AND is_del=0

SELECT id,house_no houseNo,remark_name remarkName,area,address,type,building,unit,room,state, due_time dueTime,water_type_id waterTypeId,sale,electic_type_id electicTypeId,rubbish_type_id rubbishTypeId, property_type_id propertyTypeId,park_no parkNo,`owner` FROM ht_house
is_del=0 AND type=3
AND CONCAT_WS(',',owner,house_no) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{content},'%')
AND state=#{state}
ORDER BY id DESC,due_time ASC

SELECT h.id,h.house_no houseNo,h.remark_name remarkName,h.area,h.address,h.type,h.building,h.unit,h.room,h.state, h.due_time dueTime,h.water_type_id waterTypeId,h.sale,h.electic_type_id electicTypeId,h.rubbish_type_id rubbishTypeId, h.property_type_id propertyTypeId,h.park_no parkNo,h.`owner` FROM ht_house h LEFT JOIN ht_user_house uh ON h.id=uh.house_id WHERE uh.user_id=#{userId}

SELECT h.id,h.house_no houseNo,h.remark_name remarkName,h.area,h.address,h.type,h.building,h.unit,h.room,h.state, h.due_time dueTime,h.water_type_id waterTypeId,h.sale,h.electic_type_id electicTypeId,h.rubbish_type_id rubbishTypeId, h.property_type_id propertyTypeId,h.park_no parkNo,h.`owner`,u.openid FROM ht_house h LEFT JOIN ht_user_house uh ON h.id=uh.house_id LEFT JOIN ht_user u ON u.id=uh.user_id WHERE TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,h.due_time,NOW())>3 AND (DATE_FORMAT(h.notice_time,'%Y-%m')!=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m') OR h.notice_time IS NULL) AND u.openid IS NOT NULL
